title: 新约 - 彼得前书(1Peter) - 第 5 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 彼得前书(1Peter) -- 第 5 章 ( 本篇共有 5 章 )

lineList.en: The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:
lineList.cn: 我这作长老，作基督受苦的见证，同享后来所要显现之荣耀的，劝你们中间与我同作长老的人。

lineList.en: Feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight thereof, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;
lineList.cn: 务要牧养在你们中间神的群羊，按着神旨意照管他们。不是出于勉强，乃是出于甘心。也不是因为贪财，乃是出于乐意。

lineList.en: Neither as being lords over God's heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.
lineList.cn: 也不是辖制所托付你们的，乃是作群羊的榜样。

lineList.en: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.
lineList.cn: 到了牧长显现的时候，你们必得那永不衰残的荣耀冠冕。

lineList.en: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.
lineList.cn: 你们年幼的，也要顺服年长的。就是你们众人，也都要以谦卑束腰，彼此顺服。因为神阻挡骄傲的人，赐恩给谦卑的人。

lineList.en: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:
lineList.cn: 所以你们要自卑，服在神大能的手下，到了时候他必叫你们升高。

lineList.en: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
lineList.cn: 你们要将一切的忧虑卸给神，因为他顾念你们。

lineList.en: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:
lineList.cn: 务要谨守，儆醒。因为你们的仇敌魔鬼，如同吼叫的狮子，遍地游行，寻梢可吞吃的人。

lineList.en: Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.
lineList.cn: 你们要用坚固的信心抵挡他，因为知道你们在世上的众弟兄，也是经历这样的苦难。

lineList.en: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
lineList.cn: 那赐诸般恩典的神，曾在基督里召你们，得亨他永远的荣耀，等你们暂受苦难之后，必要亲自成全你们，坚固你们，赐力量给你们。

lineList.en: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
lineList.cn: 愿权能归给他，直到永永远远。阿们。

lineList.en: By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.
lineList.cn: 我略略的写了这信，托我所看为忠心的兄弟西拉转交你们，劝勉你们，又证明这恩是神的真恩。你们务要在这恩上站立得住。

lineList.en: The church that is at Babylon, elected together with you, saluteth you; and so doth Marcus my son.
lineList.cn: 在巴比伦与你们同蒙拣选的教会问你们安。我儿子马可也问你们安。

lineList.en: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.
lineList.cn: 你们要用爱心彼此亲嘴问安。愿平安归与你们凡在基督里的人。
